name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 7, Kiev.

Comrades of Ukrainian International Volunteer Army soldier Peng Chenliang followed his last wish and placed his photo on Kiev's Independence Square.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizen contribution: Now there are stone piers everywhere in Zhuhai, not just in front of the school.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, without the students' knowledge, China Construction Bank illegally opened bank cards for students from Shanghai Jiao Tong University who were volunteers for the "China International College Student Innovation Competition" to boost their performance, and threatened the students to accept the subsidies that should have been paid.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizen contribution: On December 11, a female truck driver died suddenly in her car in Jiulong District, Chongqing.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 12, a water tanker exploded in Sujiatun District, Shenyang, Liaoning Province.
Official report: One person suffered burns. Preliminary investigation revealed that the driver’s improper operation caused a gas flash explosion caused by the anti-rust paint remaining in the tank volatilizing.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Contributions from netizens: Now scammers have begun to defraud in the name of distributing special poverty alleviation funds. The fund distribution notices used for fraud are made to look like formal official documents and are marked as confidential.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the evening of December 12, Wenzhou, Zhejiang. A car in Cangnan County ran over two people and then fled. After the incident, the driver fled the scene.
According to reports, the driver has been arrested, one person died and one was injured.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a woman from Linyi, Shandong was detained by a large group of police and special police at the station on her way to Beijing for medical treatment. The police prevented her from taking the train to Beijing for medical treatment simply because there were previous administrative review documents in her suitcase.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 13, Yu Donglai published a post about the goals that Pang Donglai will pursue in the next few years: working less than 36 hours a week, closing on Saturdays, and taking 40 to 60 days off a year! The minimum monthly net income of employees will remain above 8,000 yuan!
If these can be achieved, the minimum income of Pang Donglai employees will exceed the per capita disposable income of 7,069 yuan in Shanghai, far exceeding the median income of 5,500 yuan in Beijing and Shanghai.
Not to mention the cost behind the high wages in Beijing and Shanghai that has not been taken into account: overtime work.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 13, only children can apply for a maximum of 20 days of "paid care leave". Everyone, go and apply for it and give it a try?
Netizens mocked in the comment section: The state has its own laws, and the factory has its own rules! Has the two-day weekend been implemented? Will there still be work after returning? Is it only for civil servants?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizen contribution On December 11, Mianyang Middle School Experimental School forced all students to sign the "Special Management Regulations", indicating that students "voluntarily" accept strict management. If they do not sign, they will be ordered to go home to review and be criticized by the grade. Once signed, they will be deprived of the freedom to leave the school on weekends. The regulations list behaviors such as dating between men and women and bringing MP3s as major violations of discipline at the same level as bullying and fighting. It also requires students to have a healthy mentality, otherwise it is also a major violation of discipline. In addition, students must arrive at school at 7.10 and stand and read aloud until 7.30, and are required to be absolutely quiet during evening self-study and not bring puffed food, otherwise it is a violation of discipline.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 13th, Wuzhong, Ningxia, a group of stray dogs attacked a passing child
In most rural areas of the country, and even in some urban areas, there are a large number of stray dogs and unattended free-range dogs, which pose a great threat to the safety of ordinary people.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, many places such as Handan, Hebei and Shanghai have begun to put sweaters on street trees.
But in China, there are children of sanitation workers who have a monthly salary of only 700 and have frozen to death, some people are facing freezing to death due to unpaid wages, and some people are suffocated to death by setting up stalls and burning charcoal for warmth for a few pieces of silver.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Not only Hebei and Shanghai, but also Binzhou, Changyuan and other places have wrapped the trees in sweaters.
Netizens in the comment area under the relevant video complained: I don’t feel warm, only cold. They really don’t treat taxpayers’ money as money. Can they do something useful? It is suggested to build a house for the tree and turn on the heating. The people of Binzhou must be very rich, right?
The comment area prompts everyone to search: Emperor Yang of Sui wrapped the tree in silk. Everyone knows what happened after Emperor Yang of Sui.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 14, the South Korean National Assembly held a plenary session, and the impeachment of Yoon Seok-yeol was passed, and Yoon Seok-yeol's presidential office was immediately suspended.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Gu Xiaohu, a villager in Huainan, Anhui, drove a small truck to a nearby gas station to buy 1,500 yuan of diesel and transported it back to refuel farm machinery for autumn harvest. On the way back, he was detained by the transportation department on suspicion of "unauthorized road transportation of dangerous goods without obtaining a dangerous goods road cargo transportation license" and was required to pay a fine of 30,000 yuan within a month. In order to pay the fine, Gu Xiaohu used 18,000 yuan from selling rice and 12,000 yuan borrowed money to pay the fine.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
According to a report on December 13, the National Bureau of Statistics said in a meeting that it was necessary to strengthen the interpretation of data release and public opinion guidance to boost confidence in development. This was questioned and ridiculed by netizens.
Netizens replied, "Boost confidence through public opinion guidance" "Actually want to surpass North Korea"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Chinese government demolishes Rebiya Kadeer building, removes legacy of prominent Uighur dissident.
China demolished the Rebiya Kadeer building in Urumqi, Xinjiang, in November, in what is seen as a continued crackdown on Uighur identity and cultural heritage.
Rebiya Kadeer, a prominent Uighur dissident behind the building who now lives in exile in the United States and was once the wealthiest woman in Xinjiang, has become a symbol of Uighur resistance to Beijing’s policies

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 12, Tai'an, Shandong. A 12-year-old girl was reported online to be receiving treatment for pelvic inflammatory disease at Xinwen Central Hospital, and she had a six-month sexual history after being infected with HPV.
Insider: The patient went to the hospital for vaginitis six months ago, but no one called the police at the time. The female doctor was asked back when she reported the case, how could you be sure that she was sexually assaulted?
On the 13th, the Women's Federation said: The girl is in hospital for treatment, and her family does not want too much attention. Health and Health Bureau: The police are involved in the investigation. Hospital: No comment.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Reported on December 13, Jimo, Shandong. Based on reports from the public and a long investigation, the police destroyed a den where live pigs were slaughtered illegally, and three people were detained.
Many netizens in the comment area believed that the police's punishment was too heavy. Netizens said, "Life is not easy, why make things difficult for the other party?" "Did they kill someone? They should be detained." "They committed the crime of intentional killing of pigs."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
North Korean special forces assist Russia in combat operations. 
Andrei Kolesnik, a member of the Russian Defense Committee, said in a recent media interview that North Korean special forces soldiers are assisting in combat operations in Russia. The reason he gave was that North Korea wanted to "accumulate actual combat experience" and emphasized that North Korean soldiers were "legally" participating in the operation in accordance with the so-called "Mutual Assistance Agreement" signed between Russia and North Korea.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Canadian research firm TechInsights disassembled Huawei's new Mate 70 Pro Plus and found that the phone was manufactured using the same 7-nanometer technology as last year's Mate 60 Pro. The chip, called Kirin 9020, was designed by Huawei and once again produced by Shanghai Semiconductor Manufacturing International Corporation.
The research firm said: This means that Huawei is still about five years behind industry leader TSMC in terms of technology.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 14, Dongyang, Zhejiang. A woman posted a video saying that her husband Chen Huayang was killed by three murderers in 2021. There were multiple witnesses at the time of the incident, but the police threatened the witnesses and deleted the surveillance footage, saying that no one entered the house to commit the crime at the time of the incident. The officials of the capital protected the murderer and turned the intentional homicide into a "suicide"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 14, Han Wenxiu said at the China Economic Annual Conference that China's economic development faces increasing external pressure and internal difficulties. The Party Central Committee with Comrade Xi Jinping as the core has united and led the whole party and people of all ethnic groups in the country to respond calmly. Over the past year, China's economy has gone through an extraordinary journey and achieved encouraging results. 
This year's GDP is expected to grow by about 5%.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 13, Zhengzhou, Henan. A man shouted outside the Martyrs Cemetery, "On the National Memorial Day, the entire Martyrs Cemetery was quiet. Revolutionary ancestors sacrificed their lives and shed their blood. On the Memorial Day, few people came. What went wrong?" Netizens responded, "How can I go there when I work 12 hours a day?" "I'm working like a cow for 12 hours" "I'm busy working to pay off my debts"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of December 14, an underground pipeline exploded near Jindi Yuebanwan in Huainan, Anhui.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, an explosion occurred in a residential building in Shenzhen Bay Yuefu Phase II, killing one person.
On December 14, someone sent flowers to mourn, and the banner on the flowers read "Where is the truth? When will we say goodbye? We are all waiting!"
The owner of the community said: Previously, some owners reported a gas leak, and the property management also had the door lock code of the 28c resident, but the property management did not enter to check, but only used a detector to check and left. The explosion occurred two hours later. The owner believed that the property management had neglected its duties.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, the "World's Best Cities in 2025" report was released. Hong Kong ranked 46th in the world last year, but this year it dropped 51 places to 97th place due to the Beijing government's weakening of its freedom, far behind London, which ranked first, Tokyo, which ranked fourth, and Singapore, which ranked fifth. However, Hong Kong's worst score was actually the prosperity that the local area once prided itself on, ranking 167th.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of December 13, in Hangzhou, when Taiwanese badminton players Li Yang/Wang Qilin were staying at a hotel, fans waiting nearby shouted "Taiwan belongs to China" but were stopped by security.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/kSloU9waT7

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 3, the Taiwan Food and Drug Administration disclosed the latest list of unqualified products inspected at the border. Among them, a batch of hairy crabs imported from China were found to have serious excessive levels of dioxin and polychlorinated biphenyls, totaling 14.6 metric tons. All of them were returned and destroyed and did not enter the Taiwanese market. 
Experts said that dioxin is a toxic chemical that may damage the liver and kidneys after consumption.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, news of layoffs and dissolution came out from China's Jiyue Auto Company. According to the media "36Kr" report: In 2018, there were more than 487 new energy vehicle companies in China, but by the end of 2023, according to incomplete statistics, there were only more than 40 new energy vehicle companies that could operate normally.
A blogger said that not only is there an oversupply of automobiles in China, but there is also an oversupply of industry practitioners, "and it is possible to follow the footsteps of the real estate industry"
